702143f-a.text:
(1)
White Plains Road (extreme left, where elevated structure is visible), east side, north from Brady Ave. to Lydig Ave. The buildings in the background continue north of Lydig Ave. The vantage point is the north side of Brady Ave., between White Plains Road and
Cruger Ave.
July 28, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, from a slightly different anale.
July 28, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
702143f-a.folder: White Plains Road & Brady Avenue, Bronx, NY
702143f-a.original_title: Bronx: White Plains Road - Brady Avenue

702144f-a.text:
White Plains Road (foreground, not seen), at the N.E. corner of
Brady Ave.
July 28, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
